title: Garrett Crochet finishes second in AL Cy Young Award voting
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Red Sox Crochet earned four out of a possible 30 first-place votes for the Cy Young Award.
Garrett Crochet was a force in his first season with Boston.

Danielle Parhizkaran/The Boston Globe Garrett Crochet had a stellar first season with the Red Sox, with the southpaw establishing himself as Boston’s long-awaited ace and one of the top arms in baseball.

title: Woman arrested for alleged attempted carjacking in Dorchester
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime The Boston woman allegedly robbed a convenience store at knifepoint before attempting a carjacking down the street.
A Boston woman was arrested Tuesday for attempting a carjacking in Dorchester while armed with a knife, according to police.
Jenisteen Tomlinson, 31, was taken into custody at about 5:30 p.

title: Julian Edelman mentions Bill Belichick as a potential fit for Giants coaching job
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots “Guy shed a single tear every time we played there.
The only time I saw him get happy [is] when he talked about [Lawrence Taylor].
" Julian Edelman is excited to see his former coach make an impact on college football.

title: Boston firefighter facing child rape, human trafficking charges, DA says
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime The alleged abuses against the Brockton man’s female victim happened over a six-year period, according to prosecutors.
A Boston firefighter is facing child rape charges after he allegedly assaulted a girl repeatedly over the course of six years, prosecutors said.
James Corbett, 60, of Brockton, was arraigned Wednesday in the West Roxbury division of Boston Municipal Court following his arrest Monday, court records show.

title: Why Nikita Zadorov is watching 2011 Bruins highlights
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Bruins "I think that's the identity we want to bring back to Boston.
" Nikita Zadorov is no stranger to doling out punishment out on the ice.
Photo by Matthew J Lee/Globe Staff Nikita Zadorov doesn’t need any added motivation or encouragement when it comes to doling out punishment out on the ice.

title: Tom Brady tabbed Patriots as top team in AFC in new power rankings
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots "New England breaks into the top three with a convincing win in Tampa.
What more is there to say?
" Tom Brady is buying into the Patriots after an 8-2 start to the season.

title: Patriots injuries: New England will play without 4 starters vs. Jets
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots Rhamondre Stevenson and Kayshon Boutte are among the sidelined players for the Patriots.
Rhamondre Stevenson will miss his third straight game with a toe injury.
(Winslow Townson/AP Images for Panini) The New England Patriots are going to be shorthanded going into Thursday’s primetime matchup against the New York Jets.

title: Revolution chart a new course with the intriguing head coach selection of Marko Mitrović
author: Hayden Bird
bullets: New England Revolution "I will use one word: Attack,” said Mitrović.
“We will attack with the ball, and we will attack the ball when we don't have the ball, and we will be very aggressive with that.
” New England Revolution head coach Marko Mitrović.
